mapper.sql: UDF_OTL_DTC_ID, CRE_COMP_ID, ANA_DASE_ID , SCT_STR_VAL, SCT_END_VAL, ROW_SLT_TYP_CD , DRT_DSG_VAL, SRC_ANA_DASE_ID , RDM_SMPL_TYP_CD , RDM_SMPL_CNT , RDM_SMPL_RATE , RDM_VAL_FIX , OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_USER_ID, WRIT_DTM
mapper.select: SELECT A.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID , A.CRE_COMP_ID , A.ANA_DASE_ID , A.SCT_STR_VAL , A.SCT_END_VAL , A.ROW_SLT_TYP_CD , A.DRT_DSG_VAL , A.SRC_ANA_DASE_ID , A.OBJ_DESCN , A.OBJ_VERS , A.REG_TYP_CD , A.WRIT_USER_ID , A.WRIT_DTM , B.ANA_DASE_NM , C.ANA_DASE_NM AS SRC_ANA_DASE_NM , A.RDM_SMPL_TYP_CD , A.RDM_SMPL_CNT , A.RDM_SMPL_RATE , A.RDM_VAL_FIX FROM WAD_UODC_DASE_ROW_DV A LEFT JOIN WAD_UODC_ANA_DASE B ON B.ANA_DASE_ID = A.ANA_DASE_ID LEFT JOIN WAD_UODC_ANA_DASE C ON C.ANA_DASE_ID = A.SRC_ANA_DASE_ID WHERE A.UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.CRE_COMP_ID = #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into WAD_UODC_DASE_ROW_DV (UDF_OTL_DTC_ID, CRE_COMP_ID, ANA_DASE_ID, SCT_STR_VAL, SCT_END_VAL, ROW_SLT_TYP_CD, DRT_DSG_VAL, SRC_ANA_DASE_ID, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_USER_ID, WRIT_DTM) values (#{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{anaDaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sctStrVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sctEndVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rowSltTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drtDsgVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srcAnaDaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{writDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into WAD_UODC_DASE_ROW_DV
UDF_OTL_DTC_ID,
CRE_COMP_ID,
ANA_DASE_ID,
SCT_STR_VAL,
SCT_END_VAL,
ROW_SLT_TYP_CD,
DRT_DSG_VAL,
SRC_ANA_DASE_ID,
RDM_SMPL_TYP_CD,
RDM_SMPL_CNT,
RDM_SMPL_RATE,
RDM_VAL_FIX,
OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, WRIT_USER_ID, WRIT_DTM

'1', 'C', #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now()
mapper.update:
UPDATE WAD_UODC_DASE_ROW_DV
ANA_DASE_ID = #{anaDaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROW_SLT_TYP_CD = #{rowSltTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RDM_SMPL_TYP_CD = #{rdmSmplTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RDM_SMPL_CNT = #{rdmSmplCnt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RDM_SMPL_RATE = #{rdmSmplRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RDM_VAL_FIX = #{rdmValFix,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCT_STR_VAL = '', SCT_END_VAL = '', DRT_DSG_VAL = '',
ROW_SLT_TYP_CD = #{rowSltTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RDM_SMPL_TYP_CD = #{rdmSmplTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RDM_SMPL_CNT = '', RDM_SMPL_RATE = '', RDM_VAL_FIX = '', SCT_STR_VAL = #{sctStrVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCT_END_VAL = #{sctEndVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRT_DSG_VAL = #{drtDsgVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SRC_ANA_DASE_ID = #{srcAnaDaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WRIT_USER_ID = #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WRIT_DTM = now()
where UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CRE_COMP_ID = #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update WAD_UODC_DASE_ROW_DV set ANA_DASE_ID = #{anaDaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCT_STR_VAL = #{sctStrVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCT_END_VAL = #{sctEndVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROW_SLT_TYP_CD = #{rowSltTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRT_DSG_VAL = #{drtDsgVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SRC_ANA_DASE_ID = #{srcAnaDaseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WRIT_USER_ID = #{writUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WRIT_DTM = #{writDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where UDF_OTL_DTC_ID = #{udfOtlDtcId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CRE_COMP_ID = #{creCompId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
